attributes.additional_details: Case in point.  When I went to see Kylie at the O2 in London at her "sold out" Golden tour I had to pay over the odds to get a ticket and my riwxwasn't even full!
attributes.background: Concerts, shows and pantos are sold out on a far too frequent basis.  Yet when people turn up on the night/afternoon they booked the seats for the apparently sold out event are empty.  This is,  quite obvilusly, down to money hungry ticket touts buying a massive amount of tickets.
